A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Re-posted review as last attempt failed:\nThis short review is from a non Star Wars fan: This movie was simply put embarrassing and frankly laughable. (1) Many plot holes. (2) A waste of a good villain with hardly a good backstory. (3) Totally superfluous side-mission that seemed to lead to nowhere. (4) Lazy storytelling. (5) Agonizing and unnecessarily tedious second act. (6) Underutilized interesting characters. (7) Porgs! a shameless merchandising gimmick. (8) Uneven pacing. (9) Odd tonal shifts due to misplaced humour. A half star rating is half a star too much.
